input_email_body:
Subject: Issue with Project Synchronization and Data Loss

Hello Customer Support, I am contacting you to report a problem with my project synchronization. The sync process has failed, and I have lost some of my data. I suspect there could be a malfunction in the integrations or compatibility issues My name is Maria Gonzalez.. I have already attempted to resolve the issue by restarting the system, reconfiguring the settings, and logging out and back in, but none of these actions have been successful. I would greatly appreciate any help you can offer to resolve this and recover my lost data You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.. Please let me know if there are any further steps I need to take or if you require additional information. Thank you for your assistance and support.
